snippet.title: Il grande gioco di Tangentopoli gameplay (PC Game, 1993)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Il grande gioco di Tangentopoli, Dos PC game produced by Xenia Edizioni in 1993 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/Tangentopoli/15734/
Il grande gioco di Tangentopoli is a pretty good Italian game, created in 1993, where you have to stop some politicians and their guards.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Global Domination - https://youtu.be/hRdeCawXvHM
Rags to Riches: The Financial Market Simulation - https://youtu.be/uoqVASzVj4Y
Capitalism - https://youtu.be/g8TFAo7cQHk
